subject: Re: It's too much!
author: babiarz3
full_text:
Frank,
Sounds like a bad morning for you. I knew this was coming, you feeling
overwhelmed with everyones thoughts and opinions. I've watched you
sway opinions depending on whats happening here on the boards, who's
speaking the loudest, etc. The fact remains that you were able to
build a device that allows "something" to occur. It is nothing short
of amazing.
My only suggestion to you on this obvious overwhelming day, is to
remember that you and Chris met for a reason. You were guided to him.
The friendship has gone back and forth since but inevitably something
happens that validates for you the things that Chris has said. It is
okay that you have different opinions. You both really work in
separate environments. Your opinions are based on your experiences in
the development of the devices and the group you interact with. Chris'
are based on the environments that he works in and the group that
assists him. 
It would be a shame to let anyones opinions, including mine, interfere
with your friendship and working relationship with Chris.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>
> 
> Hi All;
>  
>  I feel like I'm getting pulled inmultiple directions, each wanting
to validate, and endorse their version of the box, and/or the results.
It's nerve wracking, and making me nuts. I don't know what is the
correct use, function, or output of the box, I know only how I use it.
I get what most others get, and more. What everyoe else does wiht it
is up to them. The box is an ITC devcie, my orignal use was to use for
my own communications. It seemed rel;ated to EVP, so i shared my
results on various EVP web sites, and groups. I regret that, I  wish I
would have kept it to myself. Humanity doesn't even understand their
own minds, and yet they want to comunicate with the higher realms. The
other uses, such as spirit communcation, I tend to stay away from,
it's too unpredeictable, and you can't tell who/what is talking.
Personally I think 90% is your own minds talking back to you, and
giving what is expected.  
>  
>  I've reached a point where I've had enough public interaction.
Everyone wnat to beat up Moon, yet everyone wants to do the same
friggin' things, and I'm stuck in the middle.  I don't vcare about
demons, bad guys, or saints coming through, I have my own group that
comes through, and that's what the box was made for. 
>  
>  Frank-S
> _________________________________________________________________
> You keep typing, we keep giving. Download Messenger and join the i'm
Initiative now.
> http://im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=TAGLM
>
